original_text: Balaam said to the donkey, ‘You have made me look silly. If I had a sword in my hand now, I would kill you.’
korean_text: 발람이 나귀에게 말하되 네가 나를 거역하기 때문이니 내 손에 칼이 있었더면 곧 너를 죽였으리라

sentences.original_text: You have made me look silly
If I had a sword in my hand now
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 지금 손에 칼을 가지고 있다면
